items.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: A skilled rider of rocs and whales, Shaldoor believes that Annam the All-Father shattered the ordning to push giants into war against the dragons. She is thrilled to be on the front lines in this great conflict!
Ideal: "Giants are made for warâ€”storm giants most of all!"
Bond: "Ostoria is gone, yet I long for the return of a mighty giant empire."
Flaw: "I like to rain destruction down upon my enemies, and I never show them mercy."
